definition: clustered together but not coherent, a collection of objects laid on top of each other, to form into one cluster
details:
adjective
- clustered together but not coherent
= example: clustered together but not coherent
= synonyms: agglomerated, agglomerative, clustered
noun
- a collection of objects laid on top of each other
= synonyms: mound
- volcanic rock consisting of large fragments fused together
verb
- to form into one cluster
= example: to form into one cluster
